title: Classic Movie Taglines
description: Some movie taglines are as famous as the films themselves! Can you match these iconic taglines to the right movie?

questions.question: Which film used the tagline 'In space no one can hear you scream'?
'Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the water' was the tagline for which sequel?
Which 1975 film's poster tagline warned: 'Don't go in the water'?
'A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...' opens which 1977 film?
options: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

questions.question: 'Be afraid. Be very afraid.' was the tagline for which 1986 horror film?
Which film proclaimed 'The greatest story of love and adventure ever told' on its posters?
'Who you gonna call?' was the famous tagline for which 1984 comedy?
'The man with the hat is back' promoted which 1984 sequel?
options: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

questions.question: 'An adventure 65 million years in the making' was the tagline for which 1993 Spielberg film?
'Love means never having to say you're sorry' was the famous tagline from which 1970 film?
'He is afraid. He is alone. He is three million light years from home.' Which film?
options: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

questions.question: 'One man's struggle to take it easy' was the humorous tagline for which 1986 film?
'They're here.' was the chilling two-word tagline for which 1982 horror film?
'The true story of a real fake' was the tagline for which 2002 Leonardo DiCaprio film set in the 1960s?
'It's 106 miles to Chicago, we got a full tank of gas, half a pack of cigarettes, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.' Which film?
